document_title: Shoulder bursitis: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content:
Shoulder bursitis interferes with mobility and daily activities, and even causes dangerous complications if not treated early. Therefore, taking preventive measures right from the beginning is really necessary. Here are some helpful suggestions to consider:
Warm up thoroughly before exercising or playing sports; Start new exercises or sports gently and slowly, then gradually increase intensity according to ability.; Regularly take time to rest when performing repetitive movements.; Use elbow and knee pads to protect against sports injuries.; Maintain correct lying, walking, standing, and working posture; Exercise and play sports with proper technique; Regular health check-ups to monitor and detect abnormal symptoms early, to minimize unwanted complications; Build a nutritious diet, especially focusing on adding Calcium, Vitamin D... to your daily menu.
